definition: Three Gorges or Yangtze Gorges, namely: Qutang Gorge 瞿塘峽|瞿塘峡[Qu2 tang2 Xia2], Wuxia Gorge 巫峽|巫峡[Wu1 Xia2] and Xiling Gorge 西陵峽|西陵峡[Xi1 ling2 Xia2]
lit. the rear waves of the Yangtze River drive on those before (idiom)/fig. the new is constantly replacing the old/each new generation excels the previous/(of things) to be constantly evolving
pinyin: Chang2 Jiang1 hou4 lang4 tui1 qian2 lang4

definition: Yangtze River Delta Economic Zone (economic region including Shanghai, Zhejiang and Jiangsu)
pinyin: Chang2 jiang1 san1 jiao3 zhou1 jing1 ji4 qu1

definition: see 長江後浪推前浪|长江后浪推前浪[Chang2 Jiang1 hou4 lang4 tui1 qian2 lang4]
pinyin: Chang2 Jiang1 hou4 lang4 cui1 qian2 lang4

sentences.english: The Chu general Zhuang Jiao entered the region from the upper Yangtze River and set himself up as "King of Dian".
sentences.chinese: 楚国的将军庄郊从长江上游来到这里自称滇王。

sentences.english: Down the Yangzi River from Chongqing?
sentences.chinese: 是从重庆上船顺长江而下？

sentences.english: For the past 30 years or more, great changes of scouring and deposition have taken place at the Zhenyang Reach in the Changjiang River.
sentences.chinese: 三十多年来，长江镇扬河段发生了巨大的冲淤变化。

sentences.english: The middle and lower reaches of the Yangtze River are the foreland tectonic belt of the Dabieshan orogen .
sentences.chinese: 长江中下游地区，是大别造山带的前陆构造带。

sentences.english: This topic from fibreglass plant transformation projects of Jiujiang Changjiang fiberglass factory.
sentences.chinese: 本次课题来源于九江长江玻璃纤维厂改造工程。

sentences.english: There was a rare whole eclipse of the sun had happened along the Yantze Rive, China this morning.
sentences.chinese: 今天上午在中国长江沿线发生了一次罕见的日全蚀。

sentences.english: Huayou headquarter is located in the Zhejiang Tongxiang Economic Development Zone, in the delta of the Changjiang River.
sentences.chinese: 总部位于中国长江三角洲浙江桐乡经济开发区。

sentences.english: The building company yesterday announced completion of the second passage of the Changjiang Tunnel.
sentences.chinese: 昨天建设公司宣布长江隧道的第二条通道完成。

sentences.english: Every streams around the village of Shanghailuo flow into the mighty Changjiang here.
sentences.chinese: 上海螺村周围的每一条小溪都在这里流入长江。

sentences.english: The Changjiang River keeps rolling along toward the east.
The Yangtse River, the longest river in china, is the golden waterway for river transportation.
sentences.chinese: 长江是我国第一大河，是内河航运业的黄金通道。

sentences.english: Rule of bed load transport in tidal reach of the Yangtze River and distributing rule along the river are studied.
sentences.chinese: 研究长江感潮河段推移质输移规律和沿程分布规律。

sentences.english: Purple Soil distributed widely in China, especially in upper reaches of the Yangtze River.
sentences.chinese: 紫色土在我国分布较广，特别是长江上游地区。

sentences.english: Cheung Kong (Holdings) Ltd., controlled by billionaire Li Ka-shing, also took part.
sentences.chinese: 亿万富翁李嘉诚控制的长江基建也参与了其中。

sentences.english: It cost much to renovate old college buildings at the University of CHANGJIANG.
sentences.chinese: 翻新长江大学的旧校舍花费很大。

sentences.english: The distribution of Masson Pine forest is very wide in the upper ana middle reaches of Yangtse River.
sentences.chinese: 长江中上游地区马尾松林的分布非常广泛。

definition: Jialing river in Sichuan (a tributary of the Yangtze)
Huai River, main river of east China, between the Yellow River 黃河|黄河[Huang2 He2] and the Changjiang 長江|长江[Chang2 Jiang1]

Three Gorges on the Chang Jiang or Yangtze, namely: Qutang Gorge 瞿塘峽|瞿塘峡[Qu2 tang2 Xia2], Wuxia Gorge 巫峽|巫峡[Wu1 Xia2] and Xiling Gorge 西陵峽|西陵峡[Xi1 ling2 Xia2]/Sanxia or Sanhsia town in New Taipei City 新北市[Xin1 bei3 shi4], Taiwan
Changjiang 長江|长江 or Yangtze River/old name for Changjiang, especially lower reaches around Yangzhou 揚州|扬州
Gan River in Jiangxi Province 江西省[Jiang1 xi1 Sheng3]
Dongting Lake in northeast Hunan province
the Xiangjiang river in Hunan province
Nananqu district of central Chongqing municipality, formerly in Sichuan
along the river/the region around the river
